Class ULIDTypeDescriptor

java.lang.Object
org.hibernate.type.descriptor.java.AbstractJavaType<ULID>
com.dpardo.ulid.hibernate.ULIDTypeDescriptor
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, org.hibernate.type.descriptor.java.BasicJavaType<ULID>, org.hibernate.type.descriptor.java.JavaType<ULID>
public class ULIDTypeDescriptor extends org.hibernate.type.descriptor.java.AbstractJavaType<ULID>
Hibernate type descriptor for ULID (Universally Unique Lexicographically Sortable Identifier). This class defines how ULIDs are converted to and from different types (String, bytes, etc.) for persistence in a Hibernate-compatible way.
See Also:

    • unwrap

      public <T> T unwrap(ULID value, Class<T> type, org.hibernate.type.descriptor.WrapperOptions options)
      Converts a ULID object to another type (e.g., String) for persistence.
      Parameters:
      value - ULID instance
      type - Target class type
      options - Wrapper options for conversion
      Returns:
      Converted value of type T, or null if input is null
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the type is unsupported
